en.faq: ‚ùìFrequently Asked Questions 1. How do I earn money? You get {{.RewardTask}} {{.Currency}} for each approved review. The more quality reviews you write, the more you earn! 2. How does the referral system work? Share your link: https://t.me/{{.BotName}}?start={{.DeeplinkHash}} You get {{.ReferralBonus}} {{.Currency}} for each friend who joins and writes reviews. 3. How can I withdraw funds? Go to your profile and click {{.ButtonWithdrawal}}. Withdraw to card/e-wallet. 4. Why wasn't my review accepted? Reviews must be original, detailed, and meet our quality standards. Avoid short or copied reviews. 5. When will I receive payment for my review? Payments are processed automatically after moderation, usually within 24 hours.
